Message:
Another world.
It must seem like a place
so far away from ours.
Farther even than
the stars in the sky.
I thought so too at first.

But, something happened
that changed my perception.

Fran is known as
the country of flowers.
Just as its reputation suggests,
it is home to a wide
variety of them.

I even came across one
identical to the lilacs you
were growing in your garden.
It was blooming all over this land.

Their light purple bells
blowing in the wind
gave off a gentle, sweet scent.
It reminded me so much of home.

I felt as though I was back
at your mansion, my lord...

For a brief moment,
my heart felt so full.

And while I have no proof,
I strangely began to think...

That I will be able to return
to our world someday...
back to your side, my lord.
